column1: Ronaldo and Messi are the greatest players of all time
Ronaldo scored the highest goals in champions league this year. Messi with the highest assists
Messi will lead Argentina to victory
Argentina can outscore if players specially Messi can get goals and assists
Only Messi can be as good as Ronaldo
Players like Ronaldo and Messi are rare to find
Goals, assists, freekicks what a game we had
Golazo from Ronaldo, and a sublime assist from Messi
Can Mbappe outscore Messi this year
I don't like Ronaldo Messi is the best
Messi all the way. Goal goal golazo
